summary: Phase 2 COMPLETE: Fixed all 3 sorries in SaturatedConstruction.lean using axiom 5 contradiction argument. Phase 3 COMPLETE: Investigation shows temporal coherence needed for all families, but constant + temporally saturated families satisfy it. Phase 4 requires using temporal Lindenbaum for witness construction.

artifacts.summary: Handoff document for Phase 4 with temporal Lindenbaum integration strategy

partial_progress.details: Phase 2 and 3 complete. Phase 4 requires modifying exists_fullySaturated_extension to use temporal Lindenbaum (henkinLimit + temporalSetLindenbaum) for witness construction to ensure all families are temporally coherent.

completion_data.completion_summary: Phase 2: Fixed all 3 sorries in SaturatedConstruction.lean using axiom 5 (negative introspection) contradiction argument for Lindenbaum coherence. Phase 3: Investigated truth lemma temporal usage - all families need temporal coherence, but constant families with temporal saturation satisfy it automatically. Phase 4 handoff created with strategy to use temporal Lindenbaum for witness construction.
